articles.description: Build-up to mid-week Premier League fixtures, with Arsenal v Chelsea to come on Tuesday, news conferences taking place throughout the day and the latest in the Championship title race.
articles.title: Premier League build-up, Championship title-race and football latest

articles.description: The reaction to Manchester United's FA Cup semi-final win over Coventry City has been "embarrassing" and "a disgrace", says manager Erik ten Hag.
articles.title: Man Utd manager Erik ten Hag says FA Cup reaction is 'a disgrace'

articles.description: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery has extended his contract with the club until 2027.
articles.title: Unai Emery extends Aston Villa contract to 2027

articles.title: Hong Kong, China and a footballing dilemma

articles.description: Inter Milan seal their 20th Italian title by beating arch-rivals and nearest challengers AC Milan in a historic Derby della Madonnina.
articles.title: Inter seal Serie A title by winning Milan derby

articles.description: Barcelona president Joan Laporta says he will not rule out taking legal action after Lamine Yamal's 'phantom goal' during El Clasico.
articles.title: Barcelona may take legal route over Yamal's 'phantom goal' at Real Madrid

articles.description: Nelly Korda's run of five consecutive wins should mark her out as one of the sporting greats of our time, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Nelly Korda wins Chevron Championship for five in a row that deserves wider acclaim

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Middlesbrough vs Leeds United in the Championship.
articles.title: Championship LIVE: Middlesbrough v Leeds United live text commentary

articles.description: Uefa is set to confirm nations will select 26-man squads for this summer’s European Championship in Germany.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Uefa to confirm 26-man squads for Germany championship

articles.description: West Ham will hold talks with Sporting Lisbon boss Ruben Amorim, Liverpool are considering Thomas Frank, Al-Nassr remain interested in Kevin de Bruyne, plus more.
articles.title: West Ham to hold Amorim talks - Tuesday's gossip
